column6: WANT YOU TO WANT ME PART 2 Deadpool's wants to be an X-Man! One problem, though: they don't want him! But Cyclops is smart enough not to get on Deadpool's bad side. He has a plan to keep Deadpool out of the X-Men's way. But Deadpool has a plan too.
column8: | colorist:Marte Gracia | penciller:Paco Medina | penciller:Jason Pearson | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Juan Vlasco | writer:Daniel Way
